summary: Passionate software engineer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained microservices using Python, FastAPI, and Docker, serving 1M+ daily active users
Led migration of legacy monolith to microservices architecture, reducing deployment time by 60%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, reducing deployment errors by 40%
Collaborated with product and design teams to deliver 15+ features on time
Mentored 3 junior engineers and conducted code reviews to maintain code quality

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Built responsive web application using React and TypeScript, improving user engagement by 25%
Optimized database queries reducing API response time by 50%
Implemented authentication system using JWT and OAuth 2.0
Wrote comprehensive unit and integration tests achieving 85% code coverage

projects.name: AI Task Manager

projects.name: Real-time Chat Application

projects.name: Machine Learning Pipeline
